Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1983...
Released by New York (N) on 3/2/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1983 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/29/1983 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/6/1985 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/1988 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/14/1988 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/12/1991...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1993, going 4-1, 1.21...
Injured on 5/17/1993 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6-7 weeks...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 1/31/1994 (Going to NYM: P L. Aquino, SS T. Gwynn Sr., CF K. Puckett, P J. Franco. Going to CHC: 1B R. Ibanez, C M. Lieberthal, P S. Reynolds)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1995, winning 2 games with a 1.69 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1996, winning 2 games with a 1.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1996, going 5-2, 1.21...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1996...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1997, going 5-0, 1.63...
Injured on 7/20/1997 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Was selected to the 1998 Allstar game...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Houston on 7/20/1998, striking out 4...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1998, winning 3 games with a 0.36 ERA...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1998...
